dialog.text: We are never going to get this project done in 5 days.  Most of the team are just concentrating on getting ready for submitting.  How is your team getting on?

I wish I had written stuff up as I went along, am having to spend time rewatching all the guest lectures and re-writing my notes.  I shared some with Jeff and he gave me some good pointers, like adding Harvard referencing.  He didn't sound very happy though, he said he had re-written his several times already.  Its such a faff though, don't you think?

joins.text: Starting to think exams weren't so bad 😃
You're a natural at this stuff though.

dialog.text: Did I tell you that Jeff said he was laughing so hard in the meeting yesterday as he saw I had an Ed Sheeran poster in the background, not sure what he found so funny.  When I challenged him to turn his on - he had transformers - so who's laughing now! 😂 Anyway, got to go.  Keep at it!
